t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: There must be a solution from your mother.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I won't leave until I meet with her and convince her to turn it off.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You won't surrender? You're still going to fail though.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I will not kill myself if I fail.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: My service is valuable to Gensokyo, and I don't want the people of Kozankyo to see me like this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This incident is the one I want to kill.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Are you convinced that you will succeed?

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: The Federal Kingdom of Gensokyo will not be defeated by this accursed hair spell.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I've dealt with much worse things over the years.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: My mother thinks you're better with this hairstyle.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: She failed to realize the massive disadvantages of having floor-length hair. I will confront her.
